pullRequest.title: Prevent text extraction for empty files

commit.message: Prevent text extraction for empty files

nodes.bodyText: I think we still want to write out the extract file even if its empty, since I think this is how we determine if a service should be re-run with the "Run Enhancements" action if the force flag isn't set to true. So I'd suggest removing this if

commit.message: Write out empty full text file for binary's without content.
